sn36.23:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn36.23:1.2: “katama nu kho, bhante, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katama vedanasamudayagamini patipada?
sn36.23:1.4: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.23:2.2: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.23:2.7: Ayameva ariyo atthangiko maggo vedananirodhagamini patipada, seyyathidam—
sn36.23:2.9: Yam vedanam paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam, ayam vedanaya assado;
sn36.23:2.10: yam vedana anicca dukkha viparinamadhamma, ayam vedanaya adinavo;
sn36.23:2.11: yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam, idam vedanaya nissaranan”ti.
